ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_1: Since the age of 16, I have been fascinated by programming. Every project brings new experiences and insights. I love improving my skills and discovering new technologies.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_2: I live in Munich and am open to all possibilities. I enjoy working from anywhere, whether remotely or in the office, where I also feel comfortable.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_3: I am always eager to learn and grow, mastering new technologies and refining my skills to stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of programming.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH_4: I approach problems with analytical thinking and creativity, always seeking the most efficient and elegant solution. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn, refine my skills, and improve my persistence. I value collaboration, knowing that working together leads to the best results.
